short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rates malicious news sites on a 1-4 scale

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension warns you when you're viewing a malicious news site! These websites can be classified as: including fake or misleading stories to generate attention, circulating misleading/unreliable information, or using clickbait headlines to drive traffic. Purposefully fake website (eg The Onion) are also included.

Based on the great classification of malicious news sites by Prof. Zimdars @ goo.gl/mPUAqy

The plan is to switch from the popup-based system to a notification-based system eventuallyâ„¢.
